item.description:
Memphis did a great job "painting the town Ron" with their banner and sign campaign.

http://www.youtube.co...

Now it's our turn to show them a little bit of creative promotion NH style! On Saturday, August 4th, we will all convene at Hampton Beach to Paint the SKY Ron! Let's have some fun! All you have to do between now and then is to come up with a clever way to get Ron Paul's name high above the sunbathing masses. I suggest kites, but you might consider some sort of helium balloons with Ron Paul signs attached or suspended. Hint: if you don't want to make a kite, you could paint your "Ron Paul" message on a ready made kite. Bigger is better!

Be sure to bring lots of literature. There will be plenty of curious voters!

This event will only be successful with LOTS of enthusiastic participation. Can you just picture 100 or more of us doing this? Invite friends and family to make or paint their own kites and join us. This is going to make a GREAT You Tube Video! Don't be left out!

RSVP and get on board for a fun day at the beach! Rain Date will be Sunday, August 5th.

Let's launch this campaign into the stratosphere!






UPDATE: No kite to fly? No problem....
Bring any materials you have, signs, banners, literature, etc.

No signs, banners, literature? No problem...
We have plenty of everything--even several extra colorful generic kites.

Bring plenty of sunscreen. The are plenty of concession stands selling food and drink.

If anyone is good with creating You Tube Videos, now is your chance.
We NEED you! Bring your video camera!


Here's a Google map...
Ocean Blvd & D St, Hampton, NH 03842, USA

http://www.google.com... you there!
item.name: Paint the Sky Ron!
